name: Favor of the Pharaoh
description:
The Favor of the Pharaoh companion app provides the default setup for tiles and level bars, and then with a tap of the Shuffle button, randomizes the tiles and level bars. The app chooses from all of the possible 50 different tiles, enabling billions of possible combinations.

Requires the Favor of the Pharaoh board game, available direct from beziergames.com, or at all online and local game stores.
